item.title: My First Post
item.description: let me try try try Edited with Emacs Link to project Not very familiar with this but M-x stands of option + x To preview the file, use: M-x easy-hugo-preview It will open the broswer page. While editing the file, use C-x + C-s to let the change reflect on the page at any time. (C-x stands for control + x)
